title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, the changes take effect immediately.
OB: Create a working set with one project and select it. In the package view, the content is filtered accordingly.
EB: After removing the working set, the package view should display all projects and packages without any filtering.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project.
2. Select the working set in the package view.
3. Verify that the content in the package view is filtered according to the selected working set.
4. Remove the working set.
5. Verify that the package view displays all projects and packages without any filtering.
